title: Achieved 150% ROAS on Brake Pads Campaign
description: Successfully optimized our brake pads campaign through strategic keyword refinement and ad copy testing, resulting in our highest ROAS this quarter!

title: Completed Google Ads Certification
description: Just passed my Google Ads Search Certification with a 95% score! Ready to implement advanced strategies for our campaigns.

awards.message: Way to level up your skills!

title: Ran First Half Marathon

title: Reduced CPA by 35% Across All Campaigns
description: Implemented automated bidding strategies and negative keyword optimization across our entire account, resulting in significant cost savings while maintaining conversion volume.

title: Team Achieved Q4 Revenue Goal
description: Proud to announce that our PPC team exceeded Q4 revenue targets by 12%! This success belongs to everyone's hard work and collaboration.
